# idsec_identity_policy (Data Source)

The Identity service policy data source. It reads the policy information and metadata and is based on the ID of the policy.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "idsec_identity_policy" "myrole_policy" {
  policy_name = "myrole_policy"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `auth_profile_name` (String) Name of the auth profile associated with the policy
- `description` (String) Description of the policy
- `policy_name` (String) Policy Name to retrieve
- `policy_status` (String) Status of the policy
- `rev_stamp` (String) Revision stamp of the policy
- `role_names` (List of String) List of role names associated with the policy
- `settings` (Dynamic) Additional settings for the policy
